sentences: Ta on olnud selles töös üsna edukas.
Me oleme olnud sellest projektist väga rahul.
context: Olnud is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'olema' (to be). It's used in perfect tenses to indicate completed states or actions. In English, it corresponds to 'has been', 'have been', 'had been' depending on the subject and tense context. This word often appears with auxiliary verbs like 'on' (is/are) or 'olid' (was/were) to form compound verb constructions in Estonian.
